name: E-wing
ability: Experimental Scanners: You can acquire locks beyond range 3. You cannot acquire locks at range 1.

pilots.name: Corran Horn
pilots.caption: Tenacious Investigator
pilots.ability: At initiative 0, you may perform a bonus primary attack against an enemy ship in your [Bullseye]. If you do, at the start of the next Planning Phase, gain 1 disarm token.

pilots.name: Rogue Squadron Escort
pilots.text: The elite pilots of Rogue Squadron are among the Rebellion's very best.
